New Records: James Harden moved into the No. 2 spot on the career three-pointers list, surpassing Ray Allen in the Los Angeles Clippers vs. Utah Jazz game on November 18, 2024.
Key Match Events: James Harden's performance in the Los Angeles Clippers vs. Utah Jazz game on November 18, 2024, was a key match event as he achieved a new record in three-pointers.
Post-Match Reflections: James Harden reflected on his achievement of surpassing Ray Allen in three-pointers after the Los Angeles Clippers vs. Utah Jazz game on November 18, 2024.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Los Angeles Clippers vs. Utah Jazz game on November 18, 2024, was highlighted by Harden's achievement and the teams' performance.
